name: Geckoboard.Net
tagline: A comprehensive C# API wrapper library for accessing Geckoboard.com, using XML or JSON to read/write.
body:
### Welcome to GeckoBoard.Net
Geckoboard.Net is an easy solution for adding [Geckoboard](http://www.geckoboard.com/) endpoints to your MVC/WebAPI project. To install using NuGet in your project, just type:

```
PM> Install-Package geckonet
```

### Authors and Contributors
Created by Kori Francis (@djbyter)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this project? Add issues, or solve them and create pull requests. :)
